product_name: Terry Bella Halter Bike Jersey - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Terry Bella Halter Bike Jersey for women is a true beauty on the road. Polyester/spandex blend fabric wicks moisture away from the skin and dries quickly. Built-in shelf bra offers light support; bike-friendly neckline lets you lean confidently into those turns. Halter-style back has a friction-free rear suspension strap. Single rear zip pocket in the Terry Bella Halter Bike Jersey for women secures your ride essentials. Closeout.
short_description: The Terry Bella Halter Bike Jersey for women is a true beauty on the road.
